alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:03PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL BIG HORN AND EAST CENTRAL CARBON COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM MDT... At 803 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bridger, or 23 miles east of Red Lodge, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pryor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carbon; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn
